user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, reliable, and durable everyday underwear.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable and reliable everyday underwear that would provide a good fit and prevent panty lines. The soft fabric and durability mentioned in the product description were key factors in my decision, as I wanted something that would feel good against my skin and last through multiple washes. The positive review about the fit reinforced my choice.

I needed comfortable underwear that would fit well and be durable. The emphasis on softness and the tag-free design in the product description appealed to me, as I wanted something that wouldn't irritate my skin. The review highlighted the comfortable fit, which further assured me of my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer exceptional comfort, quality, and functionality. I value features such as soft materials, ergonomic designs, and effective support that enhance my overall experience. I appreciate items that are lightweight and easy to clean, as well as those that provide a good fit and durability. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are aesthetically pleasing and versatile for various occasions. On the other hand, I dislike products that compromise on quality, are difficult to use, or do not meet my expectations in terms of comfort and fit.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, reliable, and durable everyday underwear. within my expected price range: [14.49, 29.48]
What specific features or materials do you prefer in your everyday underwear for comfort and durability?

I prefer everyday underwear made of soft and breathable materials like cotton or modal for comfort. Durability is important, so I look for reinforced seams and quality elastic bands for long-lasting wear.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear> / Item ID: B08YFLPPDM / Price: $14.18 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features the ultra soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Made from ultra soft, breathable ring-spun cotton these panties will keep you feeling fresh all day with Cool Comfort wicking technology. These panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Hipster Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Breathable Underwear (Regular & Plus Size)> / Item ID: B0C547R51F / Price: $29.48 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Fruit of the Loom breathable micro-mesh low rise briefs are just what you need to help you stay cool and fresh all day long. These panties are made with breathable, micro-mesh fabric that supports the flow of air but is modest enough to ensure you are fully covered. Not only will these underwear keep you feeling your best all day long, They're designed with comfort in mind. Soft leg bands and a smooth waistband provide extra comfort, and as always, our panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for extra softness. The women's low rise brief silhouette sits below the belly button and offers full seat coverage. Stock up on these Fruit of the Loom must-haves in our convenient 6 pack!"]
